presentation.view

Class ViewProblemListFX

  • java.lang.Object
    • presentation.view.GenericViewFX
      • presentation.view.ViewProblemListFX

  • public class ViewProblemListFX
extends GenericViewFX
    View for displaying a list of Problems.
    Author:
    Samuel Hoenle

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      private static class  ViewProblemListFX.ProblemView
      Inner class for holding information to be displayed in one row in the list of problems.

    • Field Summary

      Fields

      Column containing buttons to start playing a game

      Stores information about problems returned by CtrlDomain.getDisplayableProblemInfo(String)

      Column containing buttons to display the rankings of a problem

      Column in which the number of rows of the problems are displayed

      Button containing options to filter problems after difficulties

      List of difficulties to filter after
      private java.util.List<java.lang.String> selectedPlayers
      List of player names to filter after
      private java.util.List<java.lang.String> selectedTypes
      List of types to filter after
      private javafx.scene.control.MenuButton selectPlayer
      Button containing options to filter problems after their creator

      Button containing options to filter problems after types
